title: Wrangler Men's Iconic Denim Regular Fit Snap Shirt
description: CLASSIC FIT. This classic fit shirt is cut for both practical comfort and clean style. Finished with western-inspired details, it adds a touch of Wrangler style to any outfit.

WESTERN STYLING. This jean shirt is designed with traditional finishes — classic western yokes, snap-button closures and Wrangler W stitching on the pockets — for durable functionality and authentic look.

QUALITY MATERIALS. Made with comfortable cotton fabric, this snap shirt is the perfect addition to your wardrobe. Great for everyday wear or a night at the bar, this shirt will last for years to come.
VERSATILE WEAR. Wear as a work shirt on cooler days or layer with your favorite Wrangler tee for a relaxed look.
QUICK-ACCESS STORAGE. Finished with snap buttons, this button-down features (2) front spade snap pockets for easy access.

Look no further than Wrangler for authentic, stylish clothes you'll feel good in. We took our most timeless styles and elevated them to fit the modern man. From everyday basics like tailored jeans with performance-level comfort to denim shirts with western-inspired elements, you'll find everything you need to complete your outfit. Whether your look is modern, classic, or somewhere in between, you can't go wrong with Wrangler.
